tasks.description: Cafe scene with Lisa and Max. Lisa looks tired, says 'Ich bin so müde! Ich schlafe nur fünf Stunden pro Nacht.' Max responds 'Das ist zu wenig! Du solltest mehr schlafen.' Lisa nods, 'Ich weiß. Ich sollte auch mehr Sport machen.' Max gestures encouragingly, 'Und vergiss nicht, viel Wasser zu trinken! Das ist wichtig.' Lisa takes a sip of water and smiles.
tasks.context: Full dialog demonstrating how to give health advice using 'sollte' and 'zu + infinitive' structures

specs.audio: Clear German pronunciation, friendly conversational tone, moderate pace

tasks.notes: Actors should speak naturally but clearly. Show genuine friendship and concern. Include natural gestures for drinking water and demonstrating tiredness. Pauses between exchanges for learning.
